name: Program Types
query: SELECT Id, Name, PROG__AccountJoinOnField__c, PROG__AccountProgramCompletionDateField__c, PROG__AccountProgramEndDateField__c, PROG__AccountProgramEnrollmentDateField__c, PROG__AccountProgramIdField__c, PROG__AccountProgramLapsedOnField__c, PROG__AccountProgramStageField__c, PROG__AccountProgramStartDateField__c, PROG__AccountProgramStatusField__c, PROG__AccountProgramStatusFlagField__c, PROG__AnnualStartMonth__c, PROG__AutomatedDesignationManagerClass__c, PROG__AutomaticDesignation__c, PROG__Cycle__c, PROG__Description__c, PROG__DesignationAcronym__c, PROG__EnrollGracePeriod__c, PROG__EnrollTerm__c, PROG__EnrollmentPath__c, PROG__Entity__c, PROG__ExternalId__c, PROG__HasTransition__c, PROG__ProgramLongName__c, PROG__RenewGracePeriod__c, PROG__RenewTerm__c, PROG__Stage__c, PROG__StartDateControl__c, PROG__Status__c, PROG__TransitionToProgramTypeOverride__c, PROG__TransitionType__c FROM PROG__ProgramType__c

name: Products
query: SELECT Id, Name, RecordTypeId, NU__Entity__c, NU__ConflictCodes__c, NU__Description__c, NU__DisplayOrder__c, NU__DownloadUrl__c, NU__EventSessionEndDate__c, NU__EventSessionSpecialVenueInstructions__c, NU__EventSessionStartDate__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__InventoryLastUpdated__c, NU__InventoryUsed__c, NU__Inventory__c, NU__IsDownloadable__c, NU__IsEventBadge__c, NU__IsFee__c, NU__IsShippable__c, NU__IsTaxable__c, NU__ListPrice__c, NU__QuantityMax__c, NU__RecordTypeName__c, NU__RevenueGLAccount__c, NU__SelfServiceEnabled__c, NU__ShortDescription__c, NU__ShortName__c, NU__Status__c, NU__SubscriptionAnnualStartMonth__c, NU__SubscriptionGracePeriod__c, NU__SubscriptionRenewalType__c, NU__SubscriptionStartDateControl__c, NU__SubscriptionTerm__c, NU__TrackInventory__c, NU__WebProductImageURL__c, NU__WeightInPounds__c, NU__RegistrationTypes__c FROM NU__Product__c WHERE RecordType.Name='Program'

name: Program Type Product Links
query: SELECT Id, PROG__ExternalId__c, PROG__PriceOverride__c, PROG__Product__c, PROG__ProgramType__c, PROG__Purpose__c, PROG__Stage2__c, PROG__Status__c, PROG__TermOverrideEnroll__c, PROG__TermOverrideRenew__c FROM PROG__ProgramTypeProductLink__c

name: Milestone Types
query: SELECT Id, Name, PROG__CommunityEnabled__c, PROG__Description__c, PROG__DisplayOrder__c, PROG__ExternalId__c, PROG__ProgramType__c, PROG__RequiredUnits__c, PROG__Stage__c, PROG__Status__c FROM PROG__MilestoneType__c

name: Component Type Categories
query: SELECT Id, Name, PROG__ExternalId__c, PROG__Description__c FROM PROG__ComponentTypeCategory__c

name: Component Types
query: SELECT Id, Name, PROG__CommunityEnabled__c, PROG__ComponentTypeCategory__c, PROG__CreateOnEnrollStatus__c, PROG__CreateOnEnrollUnits__c, PROG__CreateOnEnroll__c, PROG__Description__c, PROG__DisplayOrder__c, PROG__EnrollmentPath__c, PROG__ExternalId__c, PROG__Status__c, PROG__Units__c FROM PROG__ComponentType__c

name: milestone type component type links
query: SELECT Id, PROG__CommunityEnabled__c, PROG__ComponentType__c, PROG__ExternalId__c, PROG__MaxUnits__c, PROG__MilestoneType__c, PROG__MinUnits__c FROM PROG__MilestoneTypeComponentTypeLink__c
